remarks: Associative law for the scalar product of a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvscl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvscl.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvsass $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A x. B ) S C ) = ( A S ( B S C ) ) ) $.
